item.title: How to Setup a Website for Free with a Student Email
item.description: Website Code First things first you want to have your website source. In this case I used Github to host my code and even host my site through Github pages.
item.content:
Website Code

First things first you want to have your website source. In this case I used Github to host my code and even host my site through Github pages.
